name: CANDLE UNDER WATER(TGS 2019 Demo ver)
description:
This game is a demo version of the CANDLE UNDER WATER exhibited at TGS 2019.

But the version includes 10 stages.
50 stages will be recorded in the production version which will be distributed by steam.

Purpose of the game: lighting a yellow candle.
Game Genre: Action Puzzles
